parameter.name: zermelo.teachers
parameter.description: Zermelo REST API endpoint for teachers.

parameter.name: zermelo.start
parameter.description: Unix time in milisec. representing the start date for getting the appointments.

parameter.name: zermelo.appointments
parameter.description: Zermelo REST API endpoint for appointments.

parameter.name: zermelo.end
parameter.description: Unix time in milisec. representing the end date for getting the appointments. 3 weeks from now.
